page.title: 12CHILDREN'S GAMES,CATON
page.content: Here are two games that are popular in this area. BULLDOG CHARGE-To play Bulldog Charge you round up some people and choose one to be Â£on'.He(or she) stands in the middle of the playing area.He shouts "Bulldog Charge!"The other players run past to the other side.But the person in the middle tries to grab them.If he succeeds in catching a victim,he picks him up off the ground and says"Bulldog 1,2,3,"then releases him.The victim now helps to catch the others.TheÂ£bulldog' shouts again and the runners continue to charge until everyone is caught.The first one caught is nowÂ£on'. HARES AND HOUNDS-One team,the Hounds, counts to 50 while the Hares hide.When the count is finished the Hounds hunt the Hares,who,if found,remain prisoner until all the Hares are caught.Teams swap over for the next game.
